# auto-generated by grc.converter

id: timing_utils_tag_uhd_offset
label: Tag UHD Offset
category: '[Sandia]/Timing Utilities'

parameters:
-   id: type
    label: Type
    dtype: enum
    options: [c, f, s, b]
    option_labels: [Complex, Float, Short, Byte]
    option_attributes:
        type: [complex, float, short, byte]
    hide: part
-   id: rate
    label: Sample Rate
    dtype: float
    default: samp_rate
-   id: interval
    label: Tag Interval
    dtype: int
    default: '10000'
    options: ['0']
    option_labels: [Disabled]
-   id: msg_port
    label: Message Port
    dtype: enum
    default: 'False'
    options: ['True', 'False']
    option_labels: [Show, Hide]
    option_attributes:
        hide: ['False', 'True']
    hide: part

inputs:
-   domain: stream
    dtype: ${ type.type }

outputs:
-   domain: stream
    dtype: ${ type.type }
-   domain: message
    id: time
    optional: true
    hide: ${ msg_port.hide }
asserts:
- ${ interval >= 0 }
- ${ rate > 0 }

templates:
    imports: |-
        import timing_utils
        import pmt
    make: timing_utils.tag_uhd_offset_${type}(${rate}, ${interval})
    callbacks:
    - set_rate(${rate})
    - set_interval(${interval})
